# <a name="advanced-outlookcom-security-for-microsoft-365-subscribers"></a><span data-ttu-id="ad2f9-102">Microsoft 365 구독자를 위한 고급 Outlook.com 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ad2f9-102">Advanced Outlook.com security for Microsoft 365 subscribers</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ad2f9-103">모든 Outlook.com 사용자가 스팸 및 맬웨어 필터링을 활용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ad2f9-103">All Outlook.com users benefit from spam and malware filtering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ad2f9-104">Office 365 Home 및 Office 365 개인 구독자의 경우 Outlook.com는 첨부 파일 및 받은 메시지에 대 한 링크를 추가로 차단 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ad2f9-104">For Office 365 Home and Office 365 Personal subscribers, Outlook.com performs extra screening of attachments and links in messages you receive.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="ad2f9-105">자세한 내용은 [Microsoft 365 구독자를 위한 Advanced Outlook.com security](https://support.office.com/article/882d2243-eab9-4545-a58a-b36fee4a46e2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)를 참조 하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ad2f9-105">To learn more, read [Advanced Outlook.com security for Microsoft 365 subscribers](https://support.office.com/article/882d2243-eab9-4545-a58a-b36fee4a46e2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="ad2f9-106">안전한 링크를 설정 하거나 해제 하려면 [Premium 보안 설정](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/premium/security) 으로 이동 합니다 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ad2f9-106">To turn on or turn off Safe Links, go to your [Premium Security settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/premium/security) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="ad2f9-107">**설정** > **Premium**프리미엄 > **보안**).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="ad2f9-107">**Settings** > **Premium** > **Security**).</span></span>
